faq.title: Questions?
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Portyo

items.question: Why do I need a link in bio tool?
items.answer: A link in bio tool allows you to share multiple links through one URL. Instead of constantly updating your bio link, you can create a single landing page with all your important links, content, and products. It's essential for creators, businesses, and anyone who wants to maximize their social media presence.

items.question: Is Portyo free to use?
items.answer: Yes! Portyo offers a free forever plan that includes unlimited links, basic analytics, and essential features. We also offer premium plans with advanced features like custom domains, detailed analytics, e-commerce integration, and priority support.

items.question: Can I sell products through my Portyo page?
items.answer: Absolutely! Portyo includes built-in e-commerce features that let you sell digital products, physical merchandise, and services directly through your bio page. You can accept payments, manage inventory, and track sales all in one place.

items.question: How is Portyo different from Linktree?
items.answer: Portyo offers more customization options, better analytics, built-in e-commerce, appointment scheduling, and AI-powered content generation. We focus on helping you not just share links, but actually convert your audience into customers.

items.question: Can I use my own domain?
items.answer: Yes! With our Standard and Pro plans, you can connect your own custom domain to your Portyo page. This gives you a professional branded URL like yourname.com instead of portyo.me/yourname.

items.question: Is Portyo safe to use on all social media platforms?
items.answer: Yes, Portyo is completely safe and compliant with all major social media platforms including Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, YouTube, and more. We follow all platform guidelines and best practices.

items.name: Sarah Chen
items.content: Portyo completely transformed how I monetize my content. The automation features alone saved me hours every week!

items.name: Marcus Johnson
items.content: The booking scheduler is a game-changer. My clients love how easy it is to book sessions, and I love the automated reminders.

items.name: Emily Rodriguez
items.content: Finally, a link-in-bio tool that actually helps me sell my art. The product showcase feature is beautiful and converts so well!

items.name: David Park
items.content: The analytics are incredible. I can finally see exactly what my audience engages with and optimize accordingly.

items.name: Aisha Patel
items.content: Portyo makes me look professional. The custom domain and clean design have helped me land bigger clients.

items.name: James Wilson
items.content: Love how I can showcase my music, sell merch, and book gigs all in one place. My fans love the experience!
